text: There’s not a lot of women in motion design, so I was super excited last year when I heard about SWIM: Strong Women in Motion. They have podcasts with different female motion artists, which is super inspiring to me with all the “scandals” recently in the motion world.
They also have a great resource page you should all check out: <http://www.youareswim.com/resources.html>
I’m part of the punanimation group on facebook, it’s awesome.
speaking of physical limitations and designing for accessibility: <http://makezine.com/2015/06/22/developing-musical-instruments-people-physical-disabilities/>
